depression.description: I feel anxious and fearful about attending my cousin's wedding, expecting negative experiences such as being judged or criticized by family members.
I cope with family-related stress by ignoring invitations and avoiding interactions, such as not responding to the RSVP or answering phone calls.
I believe I am unwanted and unloved by my family, particularly feeling that my mother is ashamed of me.

depression.topic: Impact of childhood bullying on self-esteem
depression.description: My experiences with being bullied for my weight have deeply affected my self-esteem and body image.

depression.topic: Struggling with self-control and stress management
depression.description: I believe I am not good at handling stress and lack self-control, which leads me to avoid potentially stressful situations.

depression.topic: Negative automatic thoughts about family dynamics
depression.description: I assume that my presence at the wedding will be unwelcome and anticipate criticism, reinforcing my belief that my family does not like me.

depression.topic: Dependency on structured planning for emotional control
depression.description: I rely on scheduling pleasant activities and daily planning to feel a sense of control over my emotions and circumstances.
I feel trapped in my situation, believing that there is nothing I can do to change my life or control my behavior.
